source.261e39e2:
### Context

StopCoronaTN - Wave 2 dataset has hospital facilities ( Bed & Oxygen Supply ) details at Hospital , Town and District level. It helps Machine Learning and Data Scientist for Statistical Analysis  & Prediction Modeling 

TN - Tamil Nadu , India 

### Content

Dataset contains the Beds with oxygen , Beds without oxygen,ICU beds & Ventilators at Hospital levels
CORONA Infection details & Vaccination details will be added shortly to triangulate the analysis

### Dataset

/kaggle/input/stopcoronatn-wave-2/Tamil Nadu COVID Bed status-2021-04-19.xlsx

#### Tabs :- 
1.     Hospital-wise status
2.     Hospitals sorted 
3.     data


### Fields :- 

#### Location details

* key - Institution+District
* S.NO
* District
* Institution

#### Numerical data elements 

* COVID BEDS Total	
* COVID BEDS Occupied	
* COVID BEDS Vacant	
* OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Total	
* OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Occupied	
* OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Vacant	
* NON-OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Total	
* NON-OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Occupied	
* NON-OXYGEN SUPPORTED BEDS Vacant	
* ICU BEDS Total	
* ICU BEDS Occupied	
* ICU BEDS Vacant	VENTILATOR Total	
* VENTILATOR Occupied	
* VENTILATOR Vacant	

#### Record Audit detail

* Last updated	
* Remarks
